com.github.brunothg.game.engine.d2.scene

Interface Scene

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FPSScene, LoadingScene

    public interface Scene

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EventListener[] getEventListeners()
      Should return all EventListeners that this scene want to register.
      void paintScene(Graphics2D g, int width, int height, long elapsedTime)
      Draw actual scene state

    • Method Detail

      • paintScene

        void paintScene(Graphics2D g,
              int width,
              int height,
              long elapsedTime)
        Draw actual scene state
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics2D object to draw on
        width - Width of painting area
        height - Height of painting area
        elapsedTime - Time since the last painting

      • getEventListeners

        EventListener[] getEventListeners()
        Should return all EventListeners that this scene want to register.
        Some EventListeners maybe unsupported. See JPanel for additional information.
        This method will be called once when this scene is added to a stage.
